has gone to heath ledger 's dark and disturbing portrayal of the joker . ledger died of an accidental drug overdose before the movie was finished . ireporter chelsea itson , a 23-year-old student , went to the 12:15 a.m. showing in perrysburg , ohio , and could n't sleep afterward .  it still has me kind of jittery ,  she told cnn . itson saw the first  batman  movie , but was n't a big fan of
